Initializer# init(_:trackingMode:)

iOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+Mac Catalyst 18.0+macOS 15.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
init(
    _ target: AnchoringComponent.Target,
    trackingMode: AnchoringComponent.TrackingMode
)
```
